subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Spartans, who were ranked No. 2 in the preseason, have struggled and are in jeopardy of missing the N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: The Spartans, who were ranked No. 2 in the preseason, have struggled and are in jeopardy of missing the N.C.A.A. tournament.
